api_list.api_description: Retrieve a random Chuck Norris joke in JSON format.
Get an equipment item by index.

required_parameters.name: index
required_parameters.description: The index of the equipment to get.

query: I am planning a DnD session and need a random Chuck Norris joke to lighten the mood. Could you also get details about the equipment 'club' from the DnD 5th edition resources?
